short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable ad blocker with hip-hop flavor, premium features, privacy protection, malware/phishing protection, and sound effects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience Ad-Free Browsing with MC BLOCKA - Your Hiphop Infused Ad Blocker!

MC BLOCKA takes ad blocking to a whole new level, freeing your browsing from distractions and boosting your online experience with style. Designed with a hiphop vibe, it packs privacy, security, and customization into one sleek package. Say goodbye to intrusive ads, trackers, and malware while you surf the web with swagger.

Key Features:

Ad-Free Browsing: MC BLOCKA cleans up your web pages by blocking ads across all sites, offering a faster, uninterrupted browsing experience.

Privacy & Security: Keep your data yours! MC BLOCKA protects you from trackers and malicious content, ensuring secure, private browsing.

Custom Blocklists: Take charge with personalized blocklists, letting you decide what content to block or allow.

Ad-Blocking Statistics: Track your blocking achievements with real-time stats, so you can see just how many ads you've shut down.

Earn Badges: Collect badges for milestones in ad-blocking, with achievements that celebrate your browsing wins.

Hip-Hop Theme & Sound Effects: Enjoy MC BLOCKAâ€™s hip-hop twist with sounds and style, plus a smooth dark mode and bold fuchsia-and-orange color scheme.

Exclusive Features: Donate to unlock premium sounds, unique achievements, and added customization options, making MC BLOCKA a true game-changer for browsing.

MC BLOCKA brings powerful ad-blocking and privacy features wrapped in a fun, elegant hip-hop theme, giving you freedom to browse securely and in style.
